name: Dress Treat!
description:
PLEASE GIVE IT A MOMENT TO LOAD!

(sorry, my preloader doesn't work because flash is impossible)

DRESS TREAT! is a flash dress-up game featuring treat from LONELY WOLF TREAT with tons of cute outfits, including some based on characters from my other games! i made this in a weekend. i want to add more outfits. i never want to stop adding outfits. please suggest things for me to add to this because i would love to add to treat's wardrobe!!

by the way, the song is available for download on my soundcloud!

guest costumes by:

darkchibishadow
tryph
glitchedpuppet

UPDATES:
  • 1/13/17 - v1.1: added 8 outfits, 11 hair/hat options, 7 faces and tails, and 3 more backgrounds!

can't get enough of treat? she's a part of my webcomic, another piece of candy!

for more cute things you can check out my art blog HERE

and hey if you love all the random games i make and want to play them before everyone else, here's my patreon where you can do just that!

thanks, HAVE FUN!! <3333
